name: Hello Goodbyes
description:
Hello Goodbyes

This game might not be a game. You can think of it as a moment with yourself during which you can write what you need to write, in any language you want. Be careful though, this moment is precious: you won't be able to run the game twice.

Credits

This game is a submission to the Stratégie de Résistance à l'Amour Jam. It is made with Unity. Music, sounds, graphics and coding are from me.
Used fonts: Please write me a song by Vanessa Bays & Karla by Jonny Pinhorn
